net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_DiceRoller_critableRoll
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Given an array of rollExpressions and the critable expression, determine if onCritFrom expression was a crit. If it was, roll the RollExpression again and add the result to the total.
arg (0) = RoleExpression w/ Critable tag arg (1) = RoleExpression[] of previously rolled expression
